TableExtractDefinition.WhereClause: RULE_ID in (select trigger_rule_id from CBR_SETTLEMENT_SCHEMES where TRIGGER_RULE_ID !='000' and transaction_type in ('520','601') )
index_field in (select trigger_rule_id from CBR_SETTLEMENT_SCHEMES where TRIGGER_RULE_ID !='000' and transaction_type in ('520','601') ) and language='USA'
index_field in (select clearing_channel from CBR_SETTLEMENT_SCHEMES where TRIGGER_RULE_ID !='000' and transaction_type in ('520','601'))

SYNTH_EXTENSION in ( select synth_ext from cht_clearing_channel where index_field in (select clearing_channel from CBR_SETTLEMENT_SCHEMES where TRIGGER_RULE_ID !='000' and transaction_type in ('520','601')) ) and SYNTH_EXT_SOURCE='001'
